## sib devices

Get iOS device list

### Synopsis

Get iOS device list

```
sib devices [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -d, --detail        output every device's detail
  -f, --format        convert to JSON string and format
  -h, --help          help for devices
  -u, --udid string   device's serialNumber
```
